初遇.encontent:
Hello dear ...  Do I still have to tell you my name?
 Or sign my name first?
初遇.content:
你好，亲爱的——还需要我说自己的名字吗？还是先给你
来一个签名？

箱中气候.encontent:
If I could take a break all day today, nowhere will I go. I just
 want to sing on the balcony. And on the mist of the window,
 I will draw many many pussycats.
箱中气候.content:
如果今天可以整日休息，我哪里都不会去。我只想坐在窗
台上唱歌。在玻璃的雾气上，画上许多小猫。

致未来.encontent:
Travel to the future? Most welcome! Maybe I will become
 more famous, bringing the pictorial to the other side
 of the world.
致未来.content:
去未来？求之不得呢！搞不好我会变得更出名，将画报送
到世界另一头去哦。

孑立.encontent:
Well, it seems I have a rare opportunity to take a
 break. Even better if there's a recliner and blanket
 for me.
孑立.content:
好吧，看来我有了少见的休息时间。如果这里能有躺椅和
毯子就好了。

问候.encontent:
It's always lonely to stay somewhere quiet for a long
 time ...
问候.content: 在安静的地方待久了，心里总会空落落的……

朝晨.encontent:
I read the news every morning, just to see how the
 press piece together what they imagine me with exaggerated
 words.
朝晨.content:
我每天早上都会看新闻，看媒体们是如何用夸张的笔墨，来
拼凑出他们想象中的我。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
While wandering in the bedroom, whenever I see the
 oval diamond in my jewelry box, I know that yesterday
 was not that bad, and today will be good.
信任-朝晨.content:
每当我在卧室漫步时，一看到首饰盒里那颗椭圆形切割的
钻石，我就会认为昨天并没有那么糟糕，今天，也会是美
好的一天。

夜暮.encontent:
Hmm ... hah ... a silk robe? Thank you, but I don't
 want it. Dress me up with Chanel No.5. Only that is
 my nightwear.
夜暮.content:
嗯～哈～真丝睡袍？谢谢，但我不需要。劳驾为我喷上几
滴Chanel No. 5，它才是我唯一的睡袍。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
I often dream of my grandparents coming towards me
 in a purple mist, but they never reach my side ...
 Come closer, would you?
信任-夜暮.content:
我常常梦见祖父母们在一团紫色的迷雾中向我走来，可他
们却从未到达我的身旁……你能靠近些吗？

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Blondie, blondie, everyone likes my blonde hair. I can't believe
 it is really a technical job to do hair.Can you? When dyeing
 ... you need to do this and that ...
帽檐与发鬓.content:
金发女郎、金发女郎，大家都喜欢我的头发。但做发型可
真不是一桩简单事。你能明白吗？染发根的时候，你要做
的事情可太多了……

袖与手.encontent:
The cane? That's my "Sweet Nighty Night" ... How it
 got its name? I hope you won't have the chance to
 know.
袖与手.content:
这根手杖？我叫它“甜蜜的晚安”……至于名字的含义，我
希望你不会有知道的那一天。

衣着与身形.encontent: Rifle for soldier; dress for woman. For me, I got both.
衣着与身形.content:
步枪是战士的武器，衣服是女人的武器。在我这里，两者
并行。

嗜好.encontent:
Will you try three hundred times for a scene less than
 three seconds?I tried. For what I love, that's my
 attitude.
嗜好.content:
你会为了一个电影中不足三秒钟的镜头而尝试三百次吗？我
试过。这就是我对待喜好之物的态度。

赞赏.encontent:
I value your qualities more than your looks. After
 all, when it comes to appearance, who will win? You?
赞赏.content:
比起外貌，我更看重合作伙伴的内在。毕竟，说起外表，又
有谁比得上我呢？

亲昵.encontent:
Wives hate me. They called me Salome. They call me Lamia. They
 call me Whore of Babylon, or even Siren ... but I'm none of
 them. I'm just ... who I am.
亲昵.content:
妻子们厌恶我。她们骂我是莎乐美，是拉米亚，是大巴比
伦，是塞壬……但我谁也不是。我只是……玛丽莲而已。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
If you want to be a star, come to Hollywood;if you
 want to be yourself, then never come.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
如果你想成为明星，好莱坞是个不错的选择。如果你想成
为你自己，那就永远不要踏入好莱坞。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent: A story for another story; a secret for another secret.
闲谈Ⅱ.content: 如果你想要得到一个秘密，就得用另一个秘密来交换。

独白.encontent:
People spend thousands for my glance.But you are willing
 to pay for my soul. Thank you.
独白.content:
每个人都愿意为我的回眸一掷千金，只有你，愿意为我的
灵魂付一分钱。谢谢你。

战前.encontent: Why haven't those warm-ups walked away?
战前.content: 那些热场嘉宾怎么还没下台？

择选至终的仪式.encontent: No memory of the scene will be left.
择选至终的仪式.content: 这是不会留下回忆的一幕戏。

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Nighty night. I wish you sweet dreams.

战斗胜利.encontent: If only I could be as forgetful as them.
战斗胜利.content: 如果我也能像他们一样健忘，该有多好。

洞悉.encontent: Gosh! I am even more glamorous now!
洞悉.content: 啊呀，我的魅力正在与日俱增呢。

洞悉之底.encontent:
When they sit here, they look down at everyone ...
 The world is in my hands? ... Huh.
洞悉之底.content: 他们站在高处，俯视所有人……世界已空无一物……呵～
